thread.title: desiree chavez

author: desiree chavez
title: desiree chavez
text:
i had been looking for a rental car at a good price...
i did find one here on this site. it was easy to book and i was emailed all the info. along with the 800 # reference numbers.
i have gone through other places before and they were not as thorough .
so i will never go through another site again ....
Thank you for making everything easy and a great experience
